depression: Depression is a common mental health disorder. It's important to speak to a mental health professional if you're feeling persistently low.
If you're struggling with depression, please reach out to a helpline.
anxiety: Anxiety is a normal emotion, but excessive anxiety can interfere with daily life.
Learn more about anxiety here: https://adaa.org/understanding-anxiety
Breathing exercises and mindfulness can help manage anxiety symptoms.
stress: Stress can affect both your mind and body. Healthy coping strategies include exercise, meditation, and talking to someone you trust.
Identify stress triggers and practice relaxation techniques.

Try to maintain a regular sleep schedule and avoid screens before bed.
therapy: Therapy can be very effective for managing mental health issues.
There are many types of therapy, including CBT, DBT, and mindfulness-based therapy.
